keyMoments.title: Cavendish's Grand Entrance
keyMoments.description: Cavendish makes his first full appearance at the Corrida Colosseum, introducing himself to Luffy (disguised as Lucy) without recognizing him.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a major character who will become a key ally and future member of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
keyMoments.quote: I am Cavendish of the White Horse, the pirate prince!

keyMoments.title: Grudge Against the Worst Generation
keyMoments.description: Cavendish reveals his grudge against the Eleven Supernovas for stealing his spotlight three years ago when they arrived at Sabaody Archipelago.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Cavendish's primary motivation and creates dramatic irony as he's speaking to one of the Supernovas.
keyMoments.quote: Three years ago, my name was on everyone's lips! But then those eleven rookies appeared and stole my spotlight!

bounties.reason: Pirate activities as captain of the Beautiful Pirates

abilities.description: Cavendish wields the legendary sword Durandal with exceptional skill.

relationships.description: Cavendish harbors animosity toward Luffy as one of the Worst Generation who stole his fame, though he doesn't recognize him in disguise.

evolutionMoments.description: Cavendish speaks with Luffy (disguised as Lucy) about his hatred for the Worst Generation, unknowingly directing his grudge at one of them.

relationships.description: Farul is Cavendish's loyal white horse and trusted companion.

evolutionMoments.description: Farul appears in flashback with Cavendish.

reveals.information: Was formerly a prince of the Bourgeois Kingdom before being exiled
Seeks revenge against the Worst Generation for stealing his fame

keyMoments.title: Rebecca's Introduction
keyMoments.description: Rebecca introduces herself to Luffy and shares the legend of Kyros the Undefeated, the legendary gladiator whose statue stands in the Colosseum.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a central character of the Dressrosa Arc whose connection to Kyros and the kingdom's history will be crucial.
keyMoments.quote: That's the statue of Kyros the Undefeated. He won 3,000 battles in a row without a single loss!

relationships.description: Rebecca is the daughter of Kyros, though she has no memory of him due to the toy curse.

evolutionMoments.description: Rebecca tells Luffy about the legendary gladiator Kyros, unknowingly speaking about her own father.

reveals.information: Is a gladiator competing in the Corrida Colosseum tournament

name.japanese: ジーザス・バージェス

keyMoments.title: Jesus Burgess Wins Block A
keyMoments.description: Burgess reveals himself as the winner of Block A's battle royale, marking his first appearance after the two-year timeskip and revealing the Blackbeard Pirates' interest in the Mera Mera no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: First post-timeskip appearance of a Blackbeard Pirates commander, raising the stakes of the tournament significantly.
keyMoments.quote: Wiiihahaha! This is the power of the Blackbeard Pirates!

reveals.information: Demonstrates overwhelming strength by dominating all Block A competitors
Competing for the Mera Mera no Mi on behalf of the Blackbeard Pirates

keyMoments.title: Vice Admiral Maynard's Debut
keyMoments.description: Vice Admiral Maynard is revealed to be undercover at the Colosseum as contestant 'Capman', gathering intelligence on the wanted pirates present.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Marine infiltration of the tournament and their interest in the Mera Mera no Mi.

reveals.information: Is a Marine Vice Admiral operating undercover at the Colosseum

keyMoments.title: Gambia's Debut
keyMoments.description: Gambia appears as a competitor in the Colosseum tournament and is shown being easily defeated by the undercover Marine Maynard.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a member of Bartolomeo's crew who will later join the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

reveals.information: Member of the Barto Club under Bartolomeo

keyMoments.title: Farul Appears in Flashback
keyMoments.description: Cavendish's loyal white horse Farul appears in a flashback showing Cavendish's past before the Worst Generation's arrival.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Cavendish's faithful companion who will play a role in later battles.

relationships.description: Farul is Cavendish's extremely loyal white horse.

reveals.information: Is Cavendish's loyal white horse companion

keyMoments.title: Bellamy Confronts Luffy
keyMoments.description: Bellamy reveals he can see through Luffy's disguise and shares how he has changed since Jaya, having gone to Sky Island at the cost of his crew. He declares no bad blood between them.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Bellamy's character development and sets up his tragic arc in Dressrosa.
keyMoments.quote: I'm nothing like the man you fought in Jaya. I went to a sky island, Straw Hat, at the cost of my crew.

keyMoments.title: Bellamy Enters Block B
keyMoments.description: Bellamy enters the arena to compete in Block B, with the promise of becoming a high executive in the Donquixote Family if he wins.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Bellamy's motivation and desperate desire for Doflamingo's approval.

relationships.description: Bellamy's relationship with Luffy has evolved from mockery to respect, though they remain on different paths.

evolutionMoments.description: Bellamy reveals he went to Sky Island, proving Luffy right about dreams, and declares no bad blood between them.

reveals.information: Went to Sky Island at the cost of his crew, proving he learned to believe in dreams
Competing to become a high executive in the Donquixote Family

keyMoments.title: The Legend of Kyros
keyMoments.description: Rebecca tells Luffy about the legendary gladiator Kyros who won 3,000 consecutive matches without ever losing and disappeared 20 years ago. A massive bronze statue commemorates him.
keyMoments.significance: Plants seeds for one of the arc's most emotional storylines and the mystery of the toy curse.

relationships.description: Kyros is Rebecca's father, though she doesn't remember him due to the toy curse.

evolutionMoments.description: Rebecca speaks about the legendary Kyros to Luffy, unknowingly talking about her own father.

reveals.information: Won 3,000 consecutive gladiator matches without a single loss
Disappeared 20 years ago under mysterious circumstances
